core.name: Scroll of Resurrection
core.description: Ressurrects a dead ally with 1 hitpoint. Takes ten rounds to read.

events.onround: campaign.error('%s continues to cast Scroll of Ressurection at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onuse:
hitpoints = target.get('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
if hitpoints > 0:
   campaign.error('%s is not dead ! What a waste of a scroll !')
campaign.error('%s is casting Scroll of Ressurection at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onfinish:
campaign.warning('%s has finished casting Scroll of Resurrection at %s'  % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
target.put('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
